EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Carly, Hope you are doing well. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Sara Conde Sent: Friday, February 24, 2012 11:19 AM To: 'cschrager@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Partners Call Follow Up Dear Carly, It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeEJavVV37PmLAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">going here. The net cash we created is attached, please give me a ring to review via phone. Also I know you were intested in MBO vs. 1099 collaterall which you can find here. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
